LIAZAHAIR Deep Curly Brazilian Virgin Hair Lace Front Wig With Baby Hair Pre-Plucked Natural Hairline Wigs For Ladies
{'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.9 x 7.6 x 2.4 inches; 11.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '788988045717'}
This is my first 100% human haired wig, I usually buy synthetic blends. I love the way this hair feels, it feels so soft & the density of this hair is just right, it’s not too thick or thin. The part is already pre-plucked, but I’ll likely customize it further &  dye the hair black because it’s too brown for my liking. Other than that, this wig is perfect.
I love the way this hair feels

At first look I thought the hair was unraveled but then I realized it was the style of the hair. The hair had a slight smell nothing overpowering, that a soak in vinegar water couldn't fix. The pre loops are a good size and the twists are perfect length for the style I was going for.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user continues to emphasize women's personal care, particularly in hair removal and hair-related products. Their interest now extends to wig accessories, indicating a broader engagement with hair styling tools. Makeup tools, particularly eyebrow stamps, remain important, alongside travel essentials for convenience during trips.

- **Satisfaction Level:** Following recent purchases, the user demonstrates a keen appreciation for products that enhance their beauty regimen. Their latest experience with wig accessories has been positive, indicating effective performance in their hair-related endeavors, further solidifying their growing confidence in selecting quality items.

- **Functionality Expectation:** The user has established a strong expectation for effective performance across all categories. They have shifted from prior disappointments, now consistently favoring products that meet or exceed their functional standards, including ease of use in wig management.

- **Quality Consciousness:** The user prioritizes high-quality, reliable products, demonstrated by their discerning reviews. They remain attentive to the construction and effectiveness of both personal care and hair-related items.

- **Review Tone:** The user has maintained a positive communication style, showing a willingness to share satisfaction with products that align with their quality expectations, showcasing a focus on effective solutions for their beauty and styling needs. 

In summary, the user seeks high-quality, effective personal care, hair, and makeup products while embracing items that simplify their routine and enhance their confidence.
